content:
# It appears that the coal was not successfully inserted into the Stone Furnace, as the furnace inventory is still empty. 
# This could be due to the way I referenced the furnace entity or the method used for insertion. 
# I will attempt to insert the coal again, ensuring that I correctly reference the furnace.

# Step 21: Attempt to insert coal into the Stone Furnace again
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace_position, quantity=5)  # Try inserting 5 coal into the furnace again

# Step 22: Check the furnace inventory again to see if the coal has been added
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace_entity)
print(f'Furnace inventory after second attempt to insert coal: {furnace_inventory}')  # Check the furnace inventory again
print(f"Inventory remains: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the main inventory for any changes
